channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical -- ubuntu-ui-toolkit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical -- ubuntu-ui-toolkit

item.title: CVE-2014-1420|2024-08-06T09:42:35.314Z -- canonical -- ubuntu-ui-toolkit
item.description: On desktop, Ubuntu UI Toolkit's StateSaver would serialise data on tmp/ files which an attacker could use to expose potentially sensitive data. StateSaver would also open files without the O_EXCL flag. An attacker could exploit this to launch a symlink attack, though this is partially mitigated by symlink and hardlink restrictions in Ubuntu. Fixed in 1.1.1188+14.10.20140813.4-0ubuntu1.
